mapper.select: SELECT info.userno, info.userid, info.passwd, info.korname, info.email, info.gender, info.nickname, info.birthdate, auth.name, info.useyn FROM info_userinfo info LEFT JOIN cod_userauth auth ON info.authid = auth.authid WHERE info.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO info_userloginout( userno, ip, useragent, regdate, successyn ) VALUES( #{userno}, #{ip}, #{useragent}, NOW(), #{successyn} )
